xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.6 Hetuduka, Vitakkattika » 1.6.2 Avitakkavicāramattapada » 1.6.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Vitakkattika
Avitakkavicāramattapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
224.
431Hetu avitakkavicāramatto dhammo hetussa avitakkavicāramattassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
225.
432Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
433Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
434Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
435(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetvādiup1.6.3 Avitakkaavicārapada >>
